definition[0]: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people
example[2]: a traditional method of brewing beer
example[3]: It is traditional not to eat meat on Good Friday.
note[0]: it is traditional (for somebody) to do something
definition[1]: following ideas and methods that have existed for a long time, rather than doing anything new or different
example[4]: He has a traditional view of women.
example[5]: I went to a very traditional school.
